products.name: Reactive Glaze Bakeware Large
products.details: Dishwasher, microwave and oven safe up to 480° Fahrenheit.
products.description:
Bring something special to the table for every meal with our Reactive Glaze Bakeware. Finished with a reactive glaze—a technique admired for its variegated coloring—each piece is subtly one-of-a-kind.
• Stoneware with a reactive glaze in Black / White.
• Due to the finishing technique, variations in glaze and color are to be expected.
• Sold individually.
• Made in Portugal.
